author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Eicher Motors Says ‍Royal Enfield Announces Capex Of 8 Bln Rupees For FY 2018-19​
text:
April 3 (Reuters) - Eicher Motors Ltd:
* SAYS ‍ROYAL ENFIELD ANNOUNCES CAPEX OF 8 BILLION RUPEES FOR FY 2018-19​
* SAYS ‍ROYAL ENFIELD TO SET-UP SUBSIDIARIES IN INDONESIA AND THAILAND​
* SAYS FY CAPEX WILL INCLUDE COMMENCEMENT OF CONSTRUCTION OF PHASE-2 OF VALLAM VADAGAL PLANT IN TAMIL NADU
* SAYS ‍ROYAL ENFIELD WILL HAVE PRODUCTION CAPACITY FOR FY 2018-19 AT 950,000 MOTORCYCLES​ Source text - bit.ly/2q01EVx Further company coverage:
